description: small dish with octagonal outer rim; wide ring foot; decorated with blue and red bird with blue, green and yellow tail feathers surrounded by red, blue and gilt foliage; decorative patterns on outer rim; exterior edge decorated with four floral rondels and organic designs in blue, red and gilt; nearly identical to .21, except berries near tail feathers and tail feathers themselves differ slightly
marks:
Inscription and Sticker

on bottom, in blue: fou
title: Octagonal dish
